00064 /*
00065  * rpc_callmsg.c
00066  *
00067  * Copyright (C) 1984, Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00068  *
00069  */
00070 
00071 #include <sys/param.h>
00072 
00073 #include "Rpc.h"
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * XDR a call message
00077  */
00078 bool_t
00079 Xdr_callmsg(xdrs, cmsg)
00080         register XDR *xdrs;
00081         register struct Rpc_msg *cmsg;
00082 {
00083         register long *buf;
00084         register struct opaque_auth *oa;
00085 
00086         if (xdrs->x_op == XDR_ENCODE) {
00087                 if (cmsg->rm_call.cb_cred.oa_length > MAX_AUTH_BYTES) {
00088                         return (FALSE);
00089                 }
00090                 if (cmsg->rm_call.cb_verf.oa_length > MAX_AUTH_BYTES) {
00091                         return (FALSE);
00092                 }
00093                 buf = XDR_INLINE(xdrs, 8 * BYTES_PER_XDR_UNIT
00094                         + RNDUP(cmsg->rm_call.cb_cred.oa_length)
00095                         + 2 * BYTES_PER_XDR_UNIT
00096                         + RNDUP(cmsg->rm_call.cb_verf.oa_length));
00097                 if (buf != NULL) {
00098                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, cmsg->rm_xid);
00099                         IXDR_PUT_ENUM(buf, cmsg->rm_direction);
00100                         if (cmsg->rm_direction != CALL) {
00101                                 return (FALSE);
00102                         }
00103                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, cmsg->rm_call.cb_rpcvers);
00104                         if (cmsg->rm_call.cb_rpcvers != RPC_MSG_VERSION) {
00105                                 return (FALSE);
00106                         }
00107                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, cmsg->rm_call.cb_prog);
00108                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, cmsg->rm_call.cb_vers);
00109                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, cmsg->rm_call.cb_proc);
00110                         oa = &cmsg->rm_call.cb_cred;
00111                         IXDR_PUT_ENUM(buf, oa->oa_flavor);
00112                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, oa->oa_length);
00113                         if (oa->oa_length) {
00114                                 bcopy(oa->oa_base, (caddr_t)buf, oa->oa_length);
00115                                 buf = (long *) ((char *) buf + RNDUP(oa->oa_length));
00116                         }
00117                         oa = &cmsg->rm_call.cb_verf;
00118                         IXDR_PUT_ENUM(buf, oa->oa_flavor);
00119                         IXDR_PUT_LONG(buf, oa->oa_length);
00120                         if (oa->oa_length) {
00121                                 bcopy(oa->oa_base, (caddr_t)buf, oa->oa_length);
00122                                 /* no real need....
00123                                 buf = (long *) ((char *) buf + RNDUP(oa->oa_length));
00124                                 */
00125                         }
00126                         return (TRUE);
00127                 }
00128         }
00129         if (xdrs->x_op == XDR_DECODE) {
00130                 buf = XDR_INLINE(xdrs, 8 * BYTES_PER_XDR_UNIT);
00131                 if (buf != NULL) {
00132                         cmsg->rm_xid = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00133                         cmsg->rm_direction = IXDR_GET_ENUM(buf, enum msg_type);
00134                         if (cmsg->rm_direction != CALL) {
00135                                 return (FALSE);
00136                         }
00137                         cmsg->rm_call.cb_rpcvers = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00138                         if (cmsg->rm_call.cb_rpcvers != RPC_MSG_VERSION) {
00139                                 return (FALSE);
00140                         }
00141                         cmsg->rm_call.cb_prog = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00142                         cmsg->rm_call.cb_vers = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00143                         cmsg->rm_call.cb_proc = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00144                         oa = &cmsg->rm_call.cb_cred;
00145                         oa->oa_flavor = IXDR_GET_ENUM(buf, enum_t);
00146                         oa->oa_length = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00147                         if (oa->oa_length) {
00148                                 if (oa->oa_length > MAX_AUTH_BYTES) {
00149                                         return (FALSE);
00150                                 }
00151                                 if (oa->oa_base == NULL) {
00152                                         oa->oa_base = (caddr_t)
00153                                                 mem_alloc(oa->oa_length);
00154                                 }
00155                                 buf = XDR_INLINE(xdrs, RNDUP(oa->oa_length));
00156                                 if (buf == NULL) {
00157                                         if (Xdr_opaque(xdrs, oa->oa_base,
00158                                             oa->oa_length) == FALSE) {
00159                                                 return (FALSE);
00160                                         }
00161                                 } else {
00162                                         bcopy((caddr_t)buf, oa->oa_base,
00163                                             oa->oa_length);
00164                                         /* no real need....
00165                                         buf = (long *) ((char *) buf
00166                                               + RNDUP(oa->oa_length));
00167                                         */
00168                                 }
00169                         }
00170                         oa = &cmsg->rm_call.cb_verf;
00171                         buf = XDR_INLINE(xdrs, 2 * BYTES_PER_XDR_UNIT);
00172                         if (buf == NULL) {
00173                                 if (Xdr_enum(xdrs, &oa->oa_flavor) == FALSE ||
00174                                     Xdr_u_int(xdrs, &oa->oa_length) == FALSE) {
00175                                         return (FALSE);
00176                                 }
00177                         } else {
00178                                 oa->oa_flavor = IXDR_GET_ENUM(buf, enum_t);
00179                                 oa->oa_length = IXDR_GET_LONG(buf);
00180                         }
00181                         if (oa->oa_length) {
00182                                 if (oa->oa_length > MAX_AUTH_BYTES) {
00183                                         return (FALSE);
00184                                 }
00185                                 if (oa->oa_base == NULL) {
00186                                         oa->oa_base = (caddr_t)
00187                                                 mem_alloc(oa->oa_length);
00188                                 }
00189                                 buf = XDR_INLINE(xdrs, RNDUP(oa->oa_length));
00190                                 if (buf == NULL) {
00191                                         if (Xdr_opaque(xdrs, oa->oa_base,
00192                                             oa->oa_length) == FALSE) {
00193                                                 return (FALSE);
00194                                         }
00195                                 } else {
00196                                         bcopy((caddr_t)buf, oa->oa_base,
00197                                             oa->oa_length);
00198                                         /* no real need...
00199                                         buf = (long *) ((char *) buf
00200                                               + RNDUP(oa->oa_length));
00201                                         */
00202                                 }
00203                         }
00204                         return (TRUE);
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         if (
00208             Xdr_u_long(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_xid)) &&
00209             Xdr_enum(xdrs, (enum_t *)&(cmsg->rm_direction)) &&
00210             (cmsg->rm_direction == CALL) &&
00211             Xdr_u_long(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_call.cb_rpcvers)) &&
00212             (cmsg->rm_call.cb_rpcvers == RPC_MSG_VERSION) &&
00213             Xdr_u_long(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_call.cb_prog)) &&
00214             Xdr_u_long(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_call.cb_vers)) &&
00215             Xdr_u_long(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_call.cb_proc)) &&
00216             Xdr_opaque_auth(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_call.cb_cred)) )
00217             return (Xdr_opaque_auth(xdrs, &(cmsg->rm_call.cb_verf)));
00218         return (FALSE);
00219 }
